Unplug the power cord from the router, wait for 30 seconds, and plug it back in. Wait for the router to boot up again.\n\n2. **Check your cables**: Ensure all cables are securely connected to the correct ports on your router, modem, and device (computer, laptop, or mobile).\n\n3. **Check your internet",
